title: SENIOR JAVA DEVELOPER
description:
•	Key technologies: AEM6 (hoặc version trước gọi là CQ5) Trường hợp không có AEM6 thì strong Spring, Hibernate, JavaEE
•	Responsibilities:
•	Participate in software, ecommerce, web development projects for clients in Europe and North America
•	Carry out assigned tasks to meet all deadlines
•	Contribute in designing & implement features to meet customer’s requirements & deadlines
•	Write documents for codes
•	Identify and resolve defects
requirements:
•	Solid knowledge in Core Java
•	At least 3 years of working experience in web development using latest web technologies (Bootstrap, AngularJS, jQuery, Spring/Spring Boot, RESTful web services…)
•	Good working knowledge in JavaEE, popular open source frameworks, and Ecommerce systems
•	Good knowledge in back end technologies using Spring, Hibernate/JPA, SQL or others
•	Good teamwork skills and have experience in highly-standardized work environments
•	Very strong technical, analytical and problem solving skills
•	Initiative and the ability to work independently and in a team
•	Professional and ethnic behaviors
•	Creative, active and independent
•	Good at English
